mapper.insert: insert into user (login_name, password, mobile, user_name, identity_number, email, register_time, last_modified_time, referrer, status, salt, channel, source) value(#{loginName}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{userName}, #{identityNumber}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{referrer}, #{status}, #{salt}, #{channel}, #{source})
mapper.update: update user set email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, user_name = #{userName}, identity_number = #{identityNumber}, password = #{password}, last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime}, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, status = #{status}, referrer = #{referrer}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, last_login_source = #{lastLoginSource} where id = #{id}
